title: Assassin's Touch
content:
Assassin's Touch Uncommon 3~9 Damage 1d4 +1 Piercing+1d4 Necrotic (Conditional) Deathly Slumber: Deals an additional 1~4 Necrotic damage to creatures that are Knocked Out or Sleeping. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This long, slender blade fits perfectly between the ribs of any unsuspecting victim. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 40
